title: I am a Level 30 and cannot post.
body:
I am Level 30 in-game, but my profile on the boards says that I am Level 4. When I posted something like this earlier, it updated that to Level 30, so I deleted the post. However, I still can't post as it says my profile level needs to be higher (Level 6-12). Can I get a fix for this?

Thanks!

replies.body: Sometimes an account has to sync with the boards when posting for the first time.  It looks like your post here has updated your profile!  Are you still having trouble posting?
You were exactly right.  Thanks for the reply.
Yeah, when I posted it updated on my profile but apparently didn't register for a while, as I couldn't make posts. It's all fixed now, thanks for the help!
Ditto.  Just added a discussion above about the same thing.
